title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 377.2 - Certificate and permit requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 377.2 - Certificate and permit requirements

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall initiate construction or operation of a new industrial hazardous waste
facility without a certificate unless the proposed facility is exempted
pursuant to subdivision
377.1
(f) of this

Part. (b) No person who has
received a certificate shall be relieved of the obligation to comply with any
other provisions of this Title relating to the construction and operation of
industrial hazardous waste facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
377.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
